and builders.

once your first base is
set up, you should start
expanding by preparing
your expedition force.
This includes:


one factory
one or more miner
one or more gearmover
a few fighting units

CHAPTER 3: COMBAT

Junkbots are cheap
and weak, but reliable
and versatile.
use them in bulk and in
groups to aprehend
incoming waves or to
delay the enemy.

Since they're not fast
on their own, you should
use gearmovers to bring
them close to the fight!
